sentences.en: Abdominal law: Inspiratory when loosen abdominal muscle, expiratory when contractive abdominal muscle, such thresh 3 minutes.
sentences.cn: 腹式呼吸法: 吸气时放松腹肌, 呼气时收缩腹肌, 如此反复做3分钟.

sentences.en: Farmers thresh grain with threshing machines.
In some villages farmers use a machine to thresh wheat.
sentences.cn: 在一些村子里,农民用机器来打麦.

sentences.en: In wrath You march through the earth, In anger You thresh the nations.
sentences.cn: 12你在恼恨中通行大地, 在怒气里踹踏列国.

sentences.en: Nowadays most farmers use a machine to thresh their wheat.
sentences.cn: 现在多数农民使用机器脱麦粒.

sentences.en: The farmers used to thresh the grain by hand, but now machines thresh it.
sentences.cn: 农民过去用手工打谷, 但现在用机器脱粒.

sentences.en: The grain was still sown, cut and threshed as it was a hundred years ago.
sentences.cn: 谷物的播种、收割、脱粒方法还和一百年前一样。

sentences.en: Thou didst march through the land in indignation thou didst thresh the heathen in anger.
sentences.cn: 你发愤恨通行大地.发怒气责打列国,如同打粮.

sentences.en: TY series threshers are supposed to be applied to thresh maize ear after peeling.
sentences.cn: 5TY系列脱粒机适用于扒皮后的玉米果穗脱粒作业.

sentences.en: We shall thresh the wheat, weather permitting.
sentences.cn: 天气好的话,我们就打麦.

words.tran_cn: 打谷机；打谷者；[鱼] 长尾鲨

trans.tran_en: to separate grains of corn, wheat etc from the rest of the plant by beating it with a special tool or machine

trans.tran_cn: 打（麦等），脱粒，反复地做，推敲
